agreements: Document policy override usage in unlock notes and defer real evidence capture to a follow-up run without stubs.
Regenerate checksums for updated docs and log fixture size to maintain the <100 KB rehearsal constraint.
Avoid fabricating roster or HAL telemetry; reference existing guardrail outputs and note placeholders instead.
conflicts_resolved: Agents initially proposed creating synthetic telemetry artifacts; resolution was to reference real guardrail paths only and label missing evidence as placeholders.
Repository scan discrepancies (missing unlock-notes/checksums) were attributed to sandbox snapshots; local tree confirmed files exist and were updated in place.
